group_1.textRight: Ahaha! That's amazing!
Those guys are all geared up and screaming@at each other!

group_1.textLeft: This is no laughing matter!@It's serious!
Are you saying my letter is fake?!

group_1.textRight: Are you implying MY letter is fake?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's what I've been trying to say!
This source of water has been ours@for centuries!
My family has been using this for four@generations and counting!
Now you come waltzing in claiming it's yours?@Don't be absurd!

group_1.textRight: We loaned it to you! There's nothing wrong@with us taking it back!
And if you refuse to listen,@I'll make you obey instead!

group_1.textLeft: What are you implying?!@Huh?!

group_1.textRight: I'll make you comply by FORCE!@You hear me?!

group_1.textLeft: What do you think you're doing, little girl?!@The adults are talking now!

group_1.textRight: What's more, those are some real@fancy clothes you've got.
Are you some sheltered merchant's daughter,@who thinks she can order us around?

group_1.textCenter: I am Tsuyu Mizuna, daughter of Hokuyo's@Lord Masatsuna.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:832800:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Tsuyu MIZUNA?!
No, I knew I recognized you from somewhere…!

group_1.textCenter: Please be at ease, you're making me@flustered as well…
So then, would either of you mind if I inquire@about your dispute?

group_1.textLeft: …So each of you have a deed to this claim,@but neither of them are in accordance.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we were permitted to use this waterfall@a long time ago.
Then out of nowhere, this outsider suddenly@shows up, saying it's his…
This is an official document!

group_1.textLeft: …But this was clearly written recently?

group_1.textRight: This other letter's got the same seal on it,
but the handwriting on it is nowhere near@as sloppy as this.

group_1.textLeft: For a document to be official, it must be written@by someone with good penmanship.

group_1.textRight: But even if you claim it's fake,@how will you prove it?
You're a really obnoxious little pest,@aren't you?
We'll just go to your lord or whoever@and ask who wrote this.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm…

group_1.textRight: Are you worried?

group_1.textLeft: It's not that. He just wants a solution@to the water shortage in this famine…
He knows his lies will be caught,@but he's desperate.

group_1.textRight: So this is yet another consequence@of the famine.

group_1.textLeft: And if we don't handle this situation carefully,@his lord might use it as leverage.
The last thing I want is for us to be invaded@because of this man's claims.

group_1.textRight: This is insane.
If the princess can't prove me wrong,@then this is still unresolved.

group_1.textLeft: So will you take our land by force…?

group_1.textRight: No. We'll let the gods decide who gets it.

group_1.textLeft: No, wait, you can't―!

group_1.textRight: We'll decide this with an iron-branded oath!

group_1.textLeft: That's what he was after all this time…
